data.product_name: Purely Elizabeth Organic Original, Ancient Grain Granola, Gluten-Free
data.product_description: At Purely Elizabeth, we mix in ancient grains, oats and seeds along with chewy dried fruit, organic coconut oil and organic coconut sugar for a perfectly crunchy, salty-sweet taste. Our gluten free granola is then baked in small batches to create a purely wholesome, good-for-you treat. Perfect for breakfast with milk or yogurt (non dairy of course), crumbled on top of ice cream or fruit for a sweet dessert or as a healthy snack by itself. Our granola will keep you fueled throughout your busy day.

reviews.review: As someone with a flaxseed allergy, I was thrilled to find a granola that doesn’t include any flaxseed. This Purely Elizabeth granola is a fantastic find!
Tastes okay, but a bit too sweet for my liking.
This granola is amazing! Crunchy, nutty, and just the right amount of sweet. Love it!

data.product_name: Cascadian Farm Organic Granola, Oats and Honey Cereal, Resealable Pouch
data.product_description: Organic granola: Made with organic whole grain oats and golden honey. Non-GMO: USDA certified organic non-GMO granola

reviews.review: Super satisfying and filling. The texture is perfect.
Tastes okay, but a bit too sweet for my liking.
This granola is amazing! Crunchy, nutty, and just the right amount of sweet. Love it!
Best granola I've ever had. Perfect for breakfast or a snack.

data.product_name: Matcha Green Tea Granola with Prebiotics | Natural, Hand-Baked
data.product_description: MATCHA GREEN TEA FLAVOR: Discover edible zen with Amazin' Graze's Matcha Green Tea granola. It’s packed with naturally wholesome and delicious ingredients like rolled oats, cranberries, cashews, chia seeds, white melon seeds, chicory root and japanese matcha.

reviews.review: This granola is a game-changer! The flavors are incredible.
Tastes okay, but a bit too sweet for my liking.
This granola is amazing! Crunchy, nutty, and just the right amount of sweet. Love it!
Best granola I've ever had. Perfect for breakfast or a snack.
